import db from "../Kanbas/Database"; import {Link, Navigate, Route, Routes, useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import CourseNavigation from "../Kanbas/Courses/CourseNavigation"; import Modules from "../Kanbas/Courses/Modules"; import Assignments from "./Assignments"; import AssignmentEditor from "./Assignments/AssignmentEditor"; import Home from "../Kanbas/Courses/Home" import KanbasNavigation from "./KanbasNavigation"; import Dashboard from "./Dashboard"; function Courses() { const {courseId} = useParams(); const course = db.courses.find((course) => course.id === courseId); return (
  1. course
  2. Fall 2023
  3. Home

); } export default Courses;
